content: Tell me more about this company

BlueThistle AI is a company based in Scotland, operating remotely to provide cutting-edge AI-powered chatbots and automation solutions to empower businesses, enhance customer service, and improve efficiency. They offer different AI packages with varying setup fees, monthly retainers, and support options, aiming to help businesses streamline their operations and boost productivity【5†source】. 

For more detailed information, you can visit their website at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/.
